text: Watee jikalon barang meuneukat Keunan jikarat jiplueng dum bagah Atawa maen buet sia-sia Jitinggai gata sinan jikeubah Jikeubah gata tadong di sinan Takheun bak Tuhan na nyang jroh leupah Leubeh jroh nibak maen ngon meukat Raseuki meuhat Neubri le Allah Tuhan sineujroh nyang bri raseuki Laen barangri leumoh that leupah
